page.title: 13Lochore House
page.content: People say that{LOCHORE HOUSE}is haunted by a White Lady but she seems to have no connections with "Bonnie Jean Jobson"of Lochore.She married{Sir {Walter Scott's}son in 1825 and the house was built for them.The cedars at the front were planted by Sir Walter} himself! The ground now belongs to the NCB and during World War Two the manager, head engineer and electrician from the Mary Pit occupied the house. During the 1960's Lochore House Youth Club met there and was granted Â£12,000 for a new gym to be built. Activities at the time included country dancing, gymnastics, boxing etc. Later,the premises were vandalised and the{Scottish Spastics Association}paid for the repairs. Now spastics from all over Fife meet there regularly. Derek Duffin(11) and Gordon Grant(10)
